content: मातंगः [मतंगस्य मुनेरयं अण्] {@--1@} An elephant; मातंगाः किमु वल्गितैः <ls>K. P. 7</ls>; <ls>Śi. 1. 64.</ls> {@--2@} A man of the lowest caste, a Cāṇḍāla. {@--3@} A Kirāta, a mountaineer or barbarian. {@--4@} (At the end of <ab>comp.</ab>) Any thing the best of its kind; {%<ab>e. g.</ab>%} बलाहकमातंगः.
